Question.Subject: Can you advise which internet connection?
Question.Content: HI , I am going to India for about 15 days. I need internet connection, preferably a Stick to remain connected with my business in Toronto. Can any one suggest me , which service provider offer the best services. I use SKYPE a lot for my discussions with video and voice chat. Thanks in advance to all of you for helping me out
Question.ChosenAnswer: i think u should the idea connection it is very good it has a very good speed it is like a pendrive it is very ease to user u can take unlimited it has a very nice speed

Answer.Content: Rogers has the best Wifi for Toronto, the internet stick, I dont know if it will reach india? there has to be a wifi hotspot around there somewhere
i think u should the idea connection it is very good it has a very good speed it is like a pendrive it is very ease to user u can take unlimited it has a very nice speed
